description: Atma Nirbhar Krishi Yojana in Arunachal Pradesh provides financial assistance to farmers for inputs, equipment, and infrastructure to promote self-reliant agriculture.
key_features: Subsidies for seeds, fertilizers, and machinery
Support for irrigation and storage facilities
Focus on organic and local crops

benefits.financial_support: Subsidies for agricultural inputs and infrastructure

criteria: Priority to small and marginal farmers
